title: Team-Based Online Science Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners, who are general citizens with intermediate expertise in science education, participate in collaborative activities using personal devices (BYOD). They strengthen online course design competencies through team-based projects in offline environments

learning_goals: Collaborate with team members to clearly define learning objectives for online science courses and align them with content
Develop valid evidence-based materials to assess students' science learning outcomes
Systematically plan science education experiences by applying a Learning Design (LD) framework
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
